title: macOS Fast User Switching, Show Filename Extensions, and Automatic Text Corrections (.GlobalPreferences)
description: Preference settings for system-wide automatic text replacements: Correct spelling automatically, Capitalize words automatically, Add period with double-space, Touch Bar typing suggestions and Use smart quotes and dashes. Corresponds to System Preferences > Keyboard > Text tab. As well as preferences to disable Fast User Switching and to ensure that all file extensions are displayed.

NSAutomaticDashSubstitutionEnabled.title: Automatic Dash Substitution
NSAutomaticDashSubstitutionEnabled.description: Use smart dashes. Replace double-dashes with emdash.

enum_titles: 1 - Automatic Dash Substitution/Smart dashes Enabled. Replace double-dashes with emdash.
2 - Automatic Dash Substitution/Smart dashes Disabled. Don't replace double-dashes with emdash.
1 - Automatic Period Substitution Enabled. Convert double-space to period.
2 - Automatic Period Substitution Disabled. Don't convert double-space to period.

NSAutomaticQuoteSubstitutionEnabled.title: Automatic Quote Substitution
NSAutomaticQuoteSubstitutionEnabled.description: Use smart quotes. Replace straight quotes with curly quotes.

enum_titles: 1 - Automatic Quote Substitution Enabled. Replace straight quotes with curly quotes.
2 - Automatic Quote Substitution Disabled. Don't Replace straight quotes with curly quotes.
1 - Automatic Spelling Correction Enabled. Correct spelling automatically.
2 - Automatic Spelling Correction Disabled. Don't correct spelling automatically.

NSAutomaticTextCompletionEnabled.title: Automatic Text Completion
NSAutomaticTextCompletionEnabled.description: Suggest corrections and replace text automatically.

enum_titles: 1 - Automatic Text Completion Enabled. Suggest corrections and replace text automatically.
2 - Automatic Text Completion Disabled. Don't suggest corrections and replace text automatically..

AppleShowAllExtensions.title: Display all filename extensions
AppleShowAllExtensions.description: If true, enables display of all filename extensions - CIS Benchmark Compliant: true

enum_titles: true - Display all filename extensions enabled. Enables display of all filename extensions - CIS Benchmark Compliant
false - Display all filename extensions disabled. Don't enable display of all filename extensions

com.apple.autologout.AutoLogOutDelay.title: Auto Log Out Delay
com.apple.autologout.AutoLogOutDelay.description: The autologout delay, in seconds. A value of 0 means autologout is off. In some cases, this delay may be restricted to values between 5 minutes and 24 hours.

MultipleSessionEnabled.title: Fast User Switching Permitted
MultipleSessionEnabled.description: If false, disables Fast User Switching - CIS Benchmark Compliant: false

enum_titles: false - Fast User Switching Disabled. - CIS Benchmark Compliant
